Detailed Description

Laplacian of a Gaussian edge filter.

Author:
valliappa.lakshmanan

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

edu.ou.asgbook.filters.LoGEdgeFilter.LoGEdgeFilter ( int  halfsize,
int  edgethresh 
) 

00021                                                       {
00022         double sigma = halfsize/3.0;
00023         double[][] coeffs = new double[2*halfsize+1][2*halfsize+1];
00024         double tot = 0;
00025         for (int x=-halfsize; x <= halfsize; ++x){
00026             for (int y=-halfsize; y <= halfsize; ++y){
00027                 double term1 = (x*x + y*y - sigma*sigma)/Math.pow(sigma,4);
00028                 double term2 = Math.exp(-(x*x + y*y)/(2*sigma*sigma));
00029                 double coeff = term1 * term2;
00030                 coeffs[x+halfsize][y+halfsize] = coeff;
00031                 tot += coeff;
00032             }
00033         }
00034         // ensure that coeffs add up to zero
00035         coeffs[halfsize][halfsize] -= tot;
00036         this.log = new ConvolutionFilter(coeffs);
00037         this.thresh = edgethresh;
00038     }

Member Function Documentation

LatLonGrid edu.ou.asgbook.filters.LoGEdgeFilter.edgeFilter ( final LatLonGrid  input,
File  out 
) 

00049                                                                   {
00050         // Laplacian of a Gaussian
00051         LatLonGrid dgg = log.convolve(input);
00052         KmlWriter.debugWrite(dgg, out, "laplacianofgaussian");
00053         int bound = log.getFilterNumRows();
00054         // find zero crossings in 3x3 neighborhood
00055         int nrows = dgg.getNumLat();
00056         int ncols = dgg.getNumLon();
00057         LatLonGrid result = new LatLonGrid(nrows,ncols,-1,dgg.getNwCorner(),dgg.getLatRes(),dgg.getLonRes());
00058         for (int i=bound; i < (nrows-bound); ++i) for (int j=bound; j < (ncols-bound); ++j){
00059             int mag = 0;
00060             // ver
00061             mag = checkZeroCrossing(dgg.getValue(i-1,j), dgg.getValue(i+1,j), mag);
00062             // hor
00063             mag = checkZeroCrossing(dgg.getValue(i,j-1), dgg.getValue(i,j+1), mag);
00064             // diag1
00065             mag = checkZeroCrossing(dgg.getValue(i-1,j-1), dgg.getValue(i+1,j+1), mag);
00066             // diag2
00067             mag = checkZeroCrossing(dgg.getValue(i+1,j-1), dgg.getValue(i-1,j+1), mag);
00068             // mag is over 2 bins
00069             mag /= 2;
00070             if ( mag > thresh ){
00071                 result.setValue(i,j, mag);
00072             }
00073         }
00074         return result;
00075     }

00084                                                             {
00085         // create output directory
00086         File out = OutputDirectory.getDefault("logedge");
00087         
00088         // read input
00089         DataTransform t = new GlobalPopulation.LogScaling();
00090         LatLonGrid popdensity = GlobalPopulation.read(GlobalPopulation.NORTHAMERICA, t).crop(900, 2500, 200, 200);
00091         KmlWriter.write(popdensity, out, "orig", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00092                 
00093         LoGEdgeFilter filter = new LoGEdgeFilter(5,400);
00094         LatLonGrid edges = filter.edgeFilter(popdensity, out);
00095         KmlWriter.write(edges, out, "logedge", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00096     }
